caution: This file name is case sensitive.
comments: vidly_jwtPrivateKey mentioned above is the env variable name, you need to set it.
You can set env variable in windows using 'set' command, for example: set vidly_jwt=yourPrivateKey
You can set env variable in mac using 'export' command, for example: export vidly_jwt=yourPrivateKey
This file name is case sensitive, so make sure to use 'custom-environment-variables.json' as file name.
